website_summaries.verdict: Those who want slow cookers to look good while making amazing meals are in luck with this pot, which is also budget-friendly.
pros: Can remove the handle locks if they get in the way
Good capacity for cooking for up to two people
Great for making dishes such as chili and stew
cons: While the latches are helpful in keeping the lid in place, the vent holes will leak, so pot should not be tipped

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for less than a week and finally decided to use it. While it worked great when it cooked my dinner the next morning after letting it cool all night when I went to put it in the dishwasher the lid shattered everywhere in my new dishwasher! I am so upset that I used it one time and it shattered!! Buyer beware of this item!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Quinby

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this crockpot. Its a great size even in my small kitchen. It is really pretty and actually shimmers. It gets really hot and you want to be careful where you put your hands. To me that isn't a big deal, but it is something to consider when traveling. Nothing came broken and the top fits tightly. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Quotenia Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing about this pot is the color
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this pot is the color, of course! Second is the lid, it fits tight and I can carry it places and not worry about spills. Everything else is just as good as any other crock pot I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: My sister loved this as a gift. Great color.
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved this as a gift. Was disappointed that it shipped to her in the Hamilton Beach box and not in an Amazon box. It was left on her doorstep for everyone to see what it was and could've easily been stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Diaz

customer_reviews.title: ... my Hamilton Beach Slow Cooker and I am very disappointed. Shortly after it heated up
customer_reviews.text: Tonight for the first time I used my Hamilton Beach Slow Cooker and I am very disappointed. Shortly after it heated up, whatever the handles are stuck on with softened and the lid became loose. The left handle is hanging loose and therefore the lid can't be tighten. Apart from that the purple has started to form some marks, which I have attached some images of. I would like someone to contact me about this as I have tried emailing Amazon with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pleased. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time now. So pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glitter child approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend. She didn't want just a normal one from walmart. She is a glitter child. Over a yr later & still works great. It's on boyfriend 2. Men you can replace but good cooking appliances are forever.🤗
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great purple
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and,the 5 qt size is perfect for two,of us. Cooked well and was very happy with the way the lid closed and it also has clasps to hold the lid in place if you are going somewhere.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So roomy for a 4 Qt

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Lid
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The rubber gasket on the lid absorbs the smell from whatever you cooked and it will not come out! I called Hamilton Beach and they suggested I soaked it in a paste of baking soda, which I had done. It's been in a bag with baking soda for weeks and it still smells! I probably won't use it again. The rubber that was used in producing the lid is not sealed properly. This should never be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphetta Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It was just as described in love my slow cooker!!!

customer_reviews.title: disappointed about LOW heating
customer_reviews.text: packaged well and fast delivery, on HIGH setting does NOT get very hot so it really is a SLOW cooker, you may have to increase your time for cooking seal on lid is not tight and is rimmed with a rubber sponge material for when clamping down lid for travel, color is dark purple, disappointed about LOW heating, I would not want to even try to cook anything on the low setting it could take days!!!! I would buy a different brand next time!
customer_reviews.author: BL Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for making simple retirement meals.
customer_reviews.text: Left everything behind when I moved into retirement - so bought a new slow cooker to make batches of 1 cup dinners and the same for my steel cut oats. As you can tell I don't want to waste time cooking, so this is a great way to whomp something up (all healthy like quinoa, broccoli, mushrooms, and a can of chicken cooked in chicken broth. So when I am no trying out an area restaurant, I just pull a 1 cup container out of the refrigerator and nuke dinner.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ford Ballard, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to know that it reached her home in a ...

customer_reviews.title: I love this Crock-Pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this Crock-Pot! Works amazingly well and it's so pretty! The locking lid works very, very well and it's a breeze to clean. I am 100% satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NovocaineKisses

customer_reviews.title: Although the lid is pretty sturdy and the clasps are secure
customer_reviews.text: This crockpot takes quite a while to get hot. Although the lid is pretty sturdy and the clasps are secure, the outside paneling (the purple part) gets EXTREMELY hot! Almost to where I'm considering sending it back as defective... but my pot roast did turn out pretty well. So I'll try it a few more times and pray I don't forget the siding is hot and burn myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shines and looks great. I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Regular size and very purple. Shines and looks great. I use it all the time. Can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty purple color
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say about a Crock Pot that people don't already know. This one is a beautiful, purple color. Lid clips on which is awesome for carrying! I have only had mine a week, but have used it every single day so far. I'm in love. I have it at my office so that I can turn it on each morning. I have a hot, fresh lunch at 1pm, and then have dinner ready for when I leave and pick up the teenager from practice. No more fast food restaurants. We just run home, put food on a plate, and eat.
customer_reviews.author: T.O.

customer_reviews.title: Love the 5 qt
customer_reviews.text: Tried my new crock pot today; chicken is still cook'n. Love the 5 qt. size, but the lid is a little squirrelly because it doesn't seem to be as tight as those without a gasket on the lid. Actually had to line the lid up with the clamps as if I was going to transport it to someone's house to get it to fit tighter. Hmmmmm, not sure what that's about; had hoped it would give a tighter seal. Love the color and price; will see if I send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Stella L.

customer_reviews.title: Clean up was super easy too and the lid held tight so the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say i was not sure, i usually don't buy Hamilton beach products specially online, but i used it the very next day it came in to make a beef stew my way, adding my veggies with the beef, and set it on high! It was done before dinner, way before dinner! It made the meat so tender it was falling apart! Clean up was super easy too and the lid held tight so the meat didn't dry out! beyond impressed with this, even on low it was keeping dinner hot! Other half was impressed too, never had one that worked this well! Thinking this would be the perfect gift for one of his daughters!
customer_reviews.author: Ladydarksky®

customer_reviews.title: Love my new crockpot
customer_reviews.text: I love this new slow cooker. My last crockpot died (that I had for 15 years) and this one is an excellent replacement. I love the 5 quart size as it is perfect for cooking a meal for my downsized family (kids going off to college). The lock feature is great for traveling and the temperature control works well. I love that it has a keep warm setting instead of just putting it on low. Purple is my favorite color so that is just a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new crock pot, and saw this one on sale so decided to give it a shot. It's BEAUTIFUL. The purple looks iridescent and metallic. More importantly, the crock pot is huge. I love not trying to squish food into a small one anymore. The warm setting is also really nice to have. I have traveled with this once and the locking lid worked well with hard stops! The locking lid is also great for keeping small children out of it (:
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SIZE -- not as huge and heavy as many others.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I've had other crock pots but this one is a bit smaller than most oval ones, which makes it better for the two of us (with leftovers) and much easier to tote and store. The simple On/Med/High/Warm dial is just fine; no need for all those complicated options on other, far more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Powers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slow cooker! It cooks meats and veggies perfectly.. One of the best features is the lid which clamps on so that you can transport your cooked food without worrying about spilling all over the car. I have been a fan of slow cookers for years, and this is one of the better ones. It is also easy to clean up,

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 33454 Shimmer Finish Slow Cooker, Purple, 5 quart
product_meta.description: Your slow cooker is just as likely to be needed away from home as it is at home. That's why Stay or Go Slow Cookers feature secure, clip-tight lids for spill-resistant travel. Even better, the full-grip handles make carrying them to and from the car a simple, stress-free matter. Stay or Go Slow Cookers offer you all the advantages of easy, no-watch cooking with the added benefit of worry-free travel. They're equipped to protect food en route to parties and potlucks anytime you want. Once you're back home, the stoneware insert removes for easy cleanup in the dishwasher.
feature_bullets: Clip-tight sealed lid for spill resistance
Clip-tight sealed lid locks onto slow cooker to help prevent messy spills
Bring 5 quarts of hot food to potlucks or parties anytime
Perfect size for a 5 lb. chicken or 3 lb. roast

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars296 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
